headlines.headline: NEW PEACE DEAL IN SOUTH SUDAN

items.summary: The president of South Sudan Salva Kiir and his Rival rebels commander Reak Machar signed a peace agreement yesterday in the Sudanese capital city Al-Khartoum which hosted a few sessions of peace talks. The deal is meant to put an end to the Civil war that started in 2013.

indexImage.altText: A signed agreement between the south sudanese government and the rebels
indexImage.caption: A Sudanese official shows a sheet from a signed agreement after a signing ceremony between South Sudan"s government and rebels in the Sudanese capital Khartoum on July 6, 2018

synopses.long: Ala nyi naijiria a turula ugwu n'egwuregwu bobsleigh nke afo a. ke a bu otu mbu na mba Afrika gbaa gburugburu ga amabute ya bu iko a. Ndi otu a bu Umu agbo ato si mba di iche iche n'ala Naijiria.

headlines.headline: Visa vya kwanza vya maambukizi ya Zika Marekani

items.summary: Watu wanne wanaougua virusi vya Zika mjini Florida huenda ndo visa vya kwanza vya maambukizi nchini Marekani ,kwa mujibu wa maafisa wa afya nchini humo. Kufikia sasa ,visa nje ya Marekani kusini na Visiwa vya Caribbean ambapo virusi hivyo vimeenezwa na watu wanaotembelea eneo hilo am kupitia kushiriki ngono na walioambukizwa.
